title.rendered: Ashwagandha 60 Tablets Stress Relief Manage Anxiety & Promotes Sound Sleep

content.rendered:
• Our capsules are formulated with Ashwagandha powder, processed into a concentrated extract to enhance the potency and effectiveness of this revered Ayurvedic herb.
  • Regular use of these capsules may help boost energy levels and vitality, supporting a more active and rejuvenated lifestyle.
  • Ashwagandha is also known to promote restful sleep by assisting the body in managing stress.
  • These capsules offer a convenient and powerful way to enjoy the full benefits of Ashwagandha’s natural properties.

Key Benefits:

  • Stress Reduction: Helps reduce stress and anxiety, promoting a sense of calm and relaxation.
  • Energy Boost: Supports increased energy levels, helping you maintain an active and rejuvenated lifestyle.
  • Promotes Restful Sleep: Aids in managing stress, improves sleep quality, and contributes to a peaceful night’s rest.
  • Memory Improvement: Supports cognitive function and memory enhancement for better focus and mental clarity.
  • Vitality: Helps support vitality and overall well-being.
  • Reduces Oxidative Stress: With its rich antioxidant properties, it aids in reducing oxidative stress and shields cells from damage.

Directions: Take 1 tablet twice daily preferably after meals or as recommended by the physician for better results it should be taken with warm water.

Ingredients: Ashwagandha extract.

Legal Disclaimer: This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.
